visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly sales trends with interactive tooltip pie charts using Highcharts event handling and synthetic proportional data
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two levels of dimensionality: primary temporal sales data (12 monthly points) and secondary categorical proportions (3 product categories per month). Synthetic data maintains domain consistency with sales values following a positive trend (μ=181.5k, σ=38.3) and proportional category allocations showing planned redistribution from electronics to apparel. The line-pie hybrid visualization maximizes data-ink ratio by using minimal chart junk while following Cairo's principles of salience through proportional area encoding. Tooltip interaction maintains visual unity through shared color semantics between line markers and pie sectors. Statistical anchors include monthly sales growth rate (+8.3% avg) and category redistribution trend (-27pp electronics, +27pp apparel over 12 months).
